---
title: "Pteridophyte Phylogeny Group"
---

This the homepage of the Pteridophyte Phylogeny Group (PPG), a community of scientists who maintain a taxonomic database of pteridophytes (ferns and lycophytes).

All community discussions (taxonomic proposals) are hosted publicly on GitHub. For more information, please see the [Guide to GitHub for PPG](github.qmd).

Anybody is welcome to participate. Please read [the guidelines](https://pteridogroup.github.io/guidelines.html) and [contact us](https://pteridogroup.github.io/guidelines.html#coordinating-committee) for more information if you have any questions.
